name: Narkose
description:
WARNING: Contains flashing images!

Endless nights can bring out the strangest trails of thought. 

Dreams that try to tell you something, but are hidden by abstract direction.

Maybe this night you'll find an answer.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Narkose is a short abstract puzzle game based on the strange thoughts and images that appear before we sleep.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To interact with the game and puzzles use the arrow keys and the left click on your mouse.

If you enjoyed this small project, please consider donating or leaving a review!
